source.query: select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from feedback;

query.value:
select 
sfdrw.id,
sur.first_name,
sur.last_name,
sur.email,
sur.mobile_number_country_code as country_code,
sur.mobile_phone_number as mobile_number,
sfdrw.comment as message,
sfdrw.created_at,
sfdrw.updated_at,
sfdrw.user_id
from spree_feedback_reviews sfdrw
Left join spree_users sur on sur.id = sfdrw.user_id
where sfdrw.updated_at >= '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';

source.query:
select 
  id, 
  name_en, 
  name_ar, 
  taxon_id, 
  kitchen_recipe_id as recipe_id, 
  quantity, 
  COALESCE(Cast(measurement AS CHARACTER varying),'') AS measurement,
  created_at, 
  updated_at 
from 
  spree_kitchen_ingredients
order by id ASC;

select 
  -- id,
  Cast(kitchen_ingredient_id AS integer) AS ingredient_id,
  Cast(recommended_product_id AS integer) AS product_id
from spree_ingredient_products
-- order by id asc;

SELECT id,
       product_id,
       Cast(action_price as double precision),
       action_in_stock AS track_stock,
       COALESCE(rule_supermarket_id, -1) AS supermarket_id,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	   Cast(action_sale_price as double precision) AS sale_price,
       Date(action_sale_start) AS sale_start_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_start, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS sale_start_time,
       Date(action_sale_end) AS sale_end_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_end, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)   AS sale_end_time,
       Date(availability_start_time) AS availability_start_date,
       -- availability_start_time (timestamp without time zone so we need to extract using string manipulation) 
       Date(availability_end_time) AS availability_end_date,
       stock_quantity,
       action_sale_price AS cost_price
FROM   spree_product_inventory_modifiers
order by id ASC;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from inventory_modifiers

query.value:
SELECT id,
       product_id,
       Cast(action_price as double precision),
       action_in_stock AS track_stock,
       COALESCE(rule_supermarket_id, -1) AS supermarket_id,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	   Cast(action_sale_price as double precision) AS sale_price,
       Date(action_sale_start) AS sale_start_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_start, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS sale_start_time,
       Date(action_sale_end) AS sale_end_date,
       Substring(To_char(action_sale_end, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)   AS sale_end_time,
       Date(availability_start_time) AS availability_start_date,
       -- availability_start_time (timestamp without time zone so we need to extract using string manipulation) 
       Date(availability_end_time) AS availability_end_date,
       stock_quantity,
       action_sale_price AS cost_price
FROM   spree_product_inventory_modifiers
where updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}'
order by id ASC;

source.query:
Select
  id,
  user_id,
  tenant_id,
  loyalty_member_id,
  loyalty_id,
  created_at,
  updated_at
from spree_loyalty_members;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from loyalty_member;

query.value:
Select
  id,
  user_id,
  tenant_id,
  loyalty_member_id,
  loyalty_id,
  created_at,
  updated_at
from spree_loyalty_members
where updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';

source.query:
WITH json_to_extract AS
(
       SELECT id,
              quantity_en AS quantity,
              product_id,
              created_at,
              updated_at,
              quantity_ar,
              nutrients :: jsonb AS json_data
       FROM   spree_nutritional_facts )
SELECT    id,
          quantity,
          quantity_ar,
          product_id,
          calories,
          total_fat,
          saturated_fat,
          trans_fat,
          cholesterol,
          total_carbohydrates,
          sugar,
          dietary_fiber,
          protein,
          salt,
          sodium,
          iron,
          calcium,
          vitamin_a,
          vitamin_c,
          vitamin_d,
          ph,
          created_at,
          updated_at
FROM      json_to_extract
LEFT JOIN lateral
          (
                 Select ( Regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'calories:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]            AS calories,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'total_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS total_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'saturated_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]       AS saturated_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'trans_fat:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS trans_fat,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'cholesterol:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]         AS cholesterol,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'total_carbohydrates:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1] AS total_carbohydrates,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'sugar:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]               AS sugar,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'fiber:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]               AS dietary_fiber,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'protein:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]             AS protein,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'salt:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                AS salt,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'sodium:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]              AS sodium,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'iron:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                AS iron,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'calcium:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]             AS calcium,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_a:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_a,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_c:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_c,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'vitamin_d:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]           AS vitamin_d,
                        ( regexp_matches( json_data :: text, 'ph:\s*([\d.]+)(?:\s*(kcal|g|mg))?' ) ) [1]                  AS ph ) AS nutrient_values
ON        true
ORDER BY  id ASC;

SELECT id,
	COALESCE(sku, '') AS sku,
       COALESCE(Cast(price AS DOUBLE PRECISION),0) as price,
       created_at,
       updated_at,
	COALESCE(name_en, '') AS name,
       1 AS country_id,
       1 AS order
FROM   spree_custom_products;

SELECT 
    id AS offline_product_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN (barcode_element ~ E'^\\d+$') THEN CAST(barcode_element AS BIGINT)
        ELSE -1
    END AS barcode,
    1 AS "order"
FROM   
    spree_custom_products
CROSS JOIN LATERAL unnest(barcodes) AS barcode_element
ORDER BY 
    id DESC;

select sot.id, 
	sott1.name as name_en,
	coalesce(sott2.name,'') as name_ar,
	coalesce(sott1.presentation,'') as presentation_en,
	coalesce(sott2.presentation,'') as presentation_ar,
    sot.created_at,
    sot.updated_at
	
from spree_option_types sot
left join spree_option_type_translations sott1 on sot.id = sott1.spree_option_type_id
and sott1.locale='en'
left join spree_option_type_translations sott2 on sot.id = sott2.spree_option_type_id
and sott2.locale='ar';

SELECT sov.id,
       coalesce(sovt1.name,'') as name,
       position,
	   coalesce(sovt1.presentation,'') as presentation_en,
       coalesce(sovt2.presentation,'') AS presentation_ar,
       sov.option_type_id,
       sov.created_at,
       sov.updated_at
FROM   spree_option_values sov
left join spree_option_value_translations sovt1
on sov.id = sovt1.spree_option_value_id and sovt1.locale='en'
left join spree_option_value_translations sovt2
on sov.id = sovt2.spree_option_value_id and sovt2.locale='ar';

SELECT distinct
    so.id,
    so.item_total,
    so.total,
    CASE
        WHEN so.state='delivery' THEN 'delivered'
        WHEN so.state='picking_and_staging_in_progress' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN so.state='payment' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN so.state='complete' THEN 'completed'
        WHEN so.state='confirm' THEN 'pending'
--         WHEN so.state='cart' THEN 'pending'
        WHEN so.state='canceled' THEN 'customer_cancelled'
    END AS status,
    so.user_id,
    so.completed_at,
    so.bill_address_id,
    so.ship_address_id,
    so.payment_total,
    so.created_at,
    so.updated_at,
    so.currency,
    so.item_count,
	so.canceled_at as cancelled_at,
    so.canceler_id as cancelled_by,
	CASE WHEN so.delivery_method='home_delivery' THEN 1
	WHEN so.delivery_method='store_pick_up' THEN 2
	ELSE NULL END as delivery_option_id,
	c.cancel_reason,
	e.city,
    1 as language_id,
	COALESCE(e.country_id,'1') as country_id,
	sp_max.payment_method_id as payment_option_id
	
from spree_orders so
LEFT JOIN spree_fulfilments c ON c.order_id = so.id
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses d ON d.user_id = so.user_id AND d.default = 'true'
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses e ON e.id = d.address_id
LEFT JOIN LATERAL (
    SELECT *
    FROM spree_payments sp
    LEFT JOIN spree_payment_methods spm ON spm.id = sp.payment_method_id
    WHERE sp.order_id = so.id
	 AND (
		 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM spree_payments WHERE order_id = so.id) <= 1 OR
		spm.type NOT IN ('Spree::Gateway::LoyaltyPoint', 'Spree::PaymentMethod::StoreCredit')
	 )
    ORDER BY sp.created_at DESC 
    LIMIT 1
) sp_max ON true
where so.state != 'cart'

select 
	so.id as order_id,
	so.bill_address_id as address_id,
	'true' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.bill_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id 
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

UNION ALL

select 
	ROW_NUMBER() over () as id,
	so.id as order_id,
	so.ship_address_id as address_id,
	'false' as is_bill_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.city,'') as city,
 	COALESCE(con.name,'') as country,
    sdtrans.name as district, 
	'other' as type,
	CONCAT(sa.address1, ' ', sa.address2) AS formatted_address,
 	COALESCE(sa.latitude,'0.0') as latitude,
 	COALESCE(sa.longitude,'0.0') as longitude,
	CASE 
        WHEN sa.zipcode ~ '^[0-9]+$' THEN CAST(sa.zipcode AS INT)
        ELSE NULL
    END as postal_code,
	so.special_instructions as delivery_instruction,
	so.created_at,
	so.updated_at
from spree_orders so
left join spree_addresses sa on sa.id = so.ship_address_id
left join spree_countries con on con.id=sa.country_id
left join spree_districts dist on dist.id=sa.district_id
left join spree_district_translations sdtrans on sdtrans.spree_district_id = dist.id and sdtrans.locale='en'
where so.state != 'cart'

Alter sequence order_address_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence' as update;

select sa.id,
	sa.order_id,
    sa.created_at,
    sa.updated_at,
    sa.source_id,
    sa.adjustable_id,
    sa.adjustment_reason_id as adjustable_reason_id,
    sa.amount,
    sa.promotion_code_id,
    sa.eligible,
    sa.included,
    sa.finalized,
    sa.free_sample,
    substring(sa.source_type,8) as source_type,
    sa.label,
    substring(sa.adjustable_type,8) as adjustable_type
from spree_adjustments sa
left join spree_orders so on sa.order_id = so.id and so.state !='cart'

WITH RankedResults AS (
    SELECT
        cancel_reason,
        created_at,
        updated_at,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY cancel_reason ORDER BY created_at DESC) AS rn
    FROM spree_fulfilments
    WHERE cancel_reason IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id,
    cancel_reason AS reason_en,
    '' AS reason_ar,
    true AS visible,
    created_at,
    updated_at
FROM RankedResults
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY id ASC;

SELECT
    id,
    zatca_status,
    zatca_issued_date,
    zatca_signed_xml_url,
    zatca_uuid,
    zatca_invoice_hash,
    zatca_response,
    spree_invoice_id,  -- Assuming spree_invoice_id is a reference to the id column
    created_at,
    updated_at
FROM
    public.spree_invoice_logs;

SELECT
    id,
    order_id,
    type,
    public_id,
    is_qr_generated,
    is_pdf_generated,
    meta,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    qr_file_name,
    qr_content_type,
    qr_file_size,
    qr_updated_at,
    pdf_file_name,
    pdf_content_type,
    pdf_file_size,
    pdf_updated_at,
    qr_data,
    job_id,
    zatca_status,
    zatca_issued_date,
    zatca_signed_xml_url,
    zatca_uuid,
    zatca_invoice_hash,
    zatca_response
FROM
    public.spree_invoices;

SELECT
    ROW_NUMBER() over () as id,
    sp.order_id,
    sp.response_code AS transaction_id,
    sp.amount,
    coalesce(so.currency,'') as currency,
    sp.state AS status,
    sp.payment_method_id AS payment_option_id,
    sp.source_id,
	  ss.id as shipment_id,
    substring(sp.source_type,8) AS source_type
FROM 
    spree_payments sp
left JOIN spree_orders so ON so.id = sp.order_id
LEFT JOIN spree_shipments ss on ss.order_id = so.id;
